summary: REQ-9 is implemented: the shared layout header title in frontend/src/App.tsx now renders “ZenBreathe”. No missing requirements are evident from the provided diff summary. Two non-requested metadata/documentation files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the in-app shared header title text; it did not request updating repository summary/metadata files.
